_comments.server: The Minecraft Bedrock server hostname or IP
_comments.gamertag: The display name for your bot (change this to your desired bot name)
_comments.autoReconnect: Whether to automatically reconnect on disconnect
_comments.maxReconnectAttempts: Maximum number of reconnection attempts before giving up
_comments.reconnectDelay: Base delay in milliseconds between reconnection attempts
_comments.logFriendRequests: Log when friend requests are received and accepted
_comments.statsInterval: Interval in seconds for statistics logging
_comments.pingServer: Whether to ping server for info before connecting
_comments.debugMode: Enable debug mode for more verbose logging
_comments.logPackets: Log all received packets (very verbose, only for debugging)
